title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: The resulting file should be a valid jar file if outjar is used. However, when using the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', an output file is created with a .jar extension, but it is not a valid jar file because there is no MANIFEST.MF file inside.
OB: When executing 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', the resulting .jar file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: When executing 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', the resulting .jar file should contain a valid MANIFEST.MF file inside.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>'.
2. Check the created .jar file, it should not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
